existing_features.title: Create a simple, responsive informational website for the training center referenced in the uploaded poster image, using English for all user-facing text.
Implement a single-page layout with clear sections: Hero/Intro, Courses/Programs, Gallery, Contact, and Footer.
Add a Gallery section that includes the uploaded poster image and a small photo grid area (using generated placeholder images until real photos are provided).
Add a simple Contact form (name, phone/email, message) that validates inputs on the client and shows a clear success state after submission (no external email/SMS integration).

Choose and apply a cohesive visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, components) appropriate for a local training center; keep the style consistent across all sections and do not use a blue/purple primary palette.
Add basic SEO and sharing metadata: page title, description, and favicon using generated brand assets.
Add the generated images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them from the UI (hero background, logo, icons, gallery placeholders).

Replace the existing training center name text (“Bidhathi Training Center” / “Bidhathi Skill Development Training Center”) with “MINAKHAN SKILL DEVELOPMENT TRAINING CENTER” everywhere it appears in the visible UI (header, hero title, footer, and any other on-page headings or labels that currently use the old name).

Update SEO/sharing metadata to use “MINAKHAN SKILL DEVELOPMENT TRAINING CENTER” (document title, Open Graph title, Twitter title, and any other metadata fields that currently include the old name). Keep all user-facing metadata text in English.

Regenerate/update the brand logo image to include the name “MINAKHAN SKILL DEVELOPMENT TRAINING CENTER”, and update the site to reference the updated logo asset everywhere the logo is used (header, hero, and SEO/social preview image if applicable).

Update the website to display the provided address in English in both the Contact section (under the "Location" field) and in the Footer "Contact" column, replacing the current location text. Do not display any Bengali version of the address anywhere on the page.

Add the newly uploaded poster image file "Screenshot_2026-02-11-22-30-30-93_a23b203fd3aafc6dcb84e438dda678b6-1.jpg" as an additional Gallery item (do not replace any existing gallery images). Ensure the file is placed under the frontend public assets (e.g., frontend/public/assets/uploaded/) and is referenced with the correct public URL path from the Gallery UI.

Replace the second poster currently shown in the Gallery (the image currently sourced from "/assets/uploaded/Screenshot_2026-02-11-22-30-30-93_a23b203fd3aafc6dcb84e438dda678b6-1.jpg") with the newly uploaded image file "FB_IMG_1767544089711.jpg". Place the new file under frontend/public/assets/uploaded/ and update the Gallery to reference it via the correct public URL path. Do not add an extra Gallery item; the Gallery should still display the same number of items as before, with only the second item changed.

Replace the training center name text “MINAKHAN SKILL DEVELOPMENT TRAINING CENTER” with “MALANCHA TAILORING TRAINING-CENTER” everywhere it appears in the visible UI, including (at minimum) the header brand text, hero heading, footer heading, and copyright line.

Update SEO/sharing metadata in frontend/index.html to use “MALANCHA TAILORING TRAINING-CENTER” (document title, meta description text where the center name appears, Open Graph title, Twitter title, and any other metadata fields containing the old name). Keep all user-facing metadata text in English.

Regenerate/update the brand logo and favicon image assets to include the name “MALANCHA TAILORING TRAINING-CENTER”, place them under frontend/public/assets/generated, and update all frontend references to use the new asset filenames (header logo, hero logo, favicon link, and social preview image if used). Also update logo alt text strings to reflect the new name.
